channel.title: Comments on: Losing Sight of Zen

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Excellent point. I'm looking forward to your post!
item.content:encoded: Excellent point. I’m looking forward to your post!

item.title: By: Todd Bowlby
item.dc:creator: Todd Bowlby
item.description: Zen starts where you are, not where you want to be. Just see where you are. It is that easy, but hey, lately, for something that sounds so easy, it's been almost impossible for me. But I'll be writing about that in my Zen log soon; just been busy busy lately.
item.content:encoded:
Zen starts where you are, not where you want to be. Just see where you are.
It is that easy, but hey, lately, for something that sounds so easy, it’s been almost impossible for me. But I’ll be writing about that in my Zen log soon; just been busy busy lately.
